item.title: I hate tracing old pastels in school, but this artist has made me want to give them a second chance thanks to their adorable, low-poly video game character paintings
item.description:
I hate tracing old pastels in school, but this artist has made me want to give them a second chance thanks to their adorable, low-poly video game character paintings

Low poly, high quality.
